Name: Artifacting
About the game: In this small and dark match 3 game you will put at least three of the same items in a row. At each level you will have a limited amount of movement. Collect the minimum number of points to complete the level and proceed to the next. Features: Dark atmosphere of excavations, artifacts and relics. Enjoyable music enhances the immersion. Random generation of levels of varying degrees of difficulty. A unique playing field for each level.
